description: This file defines API routes using FastAPI for managing connector definitions and plugins. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting connectors, integrating data from the database and plugin system.

methods.name: list_connectors(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a combined list of connectors from database and plugin system.

methods.name: get_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific connector by key.

methods.name: create_connector( connector_data: dict, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Creates and stores a new connector in the database.

methods.name: update_connector( connector_key: str, connector_data: dict, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Updates existing connector information in the database.

methods.name: delete_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a connector record from the database.

ctags.name: delete_connector
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: get_connector
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: update_connector
ctags.signature: ( connector_key: str, connector_data: dict, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
